name: Return Address
description:
Story:

The story is of someone who is returning to their old home after going out into the world and failing. They are moving back home for a time and getting back on their feet. It's a humbling experience, and a scary one. I hope this game means something to someone.

Credits

  • Xandris - Writing
  • Boe - The Character Sprite
  • Gwen/AMDev - Art, Programming, the rest.

You can help support this kind of work by donating to this project or supporting me on Patreon. I try to make a new game every month, and donating helps neat little things like this get made.
